about_the_game:
Rhodias is a low-rank criminal. One day, an inexplicable urge prompts him to leave his gang behind and take to the distant mountains.

While wandering the alien hinterlands, he comes across a handsome traveler who invites him to the Temple of Renewal, where he claims Rhodias is bound to obtain many answers to his questions.

Being in the sacred Temple reveals unexpected things about him, including a primal hunger he didn’t know he had. Even stranger… he now has a new desire, he’s not so comfortable admitting: a desire for a close connection with the men he meets.

Dive into this new mature story filled with mystery, tentacles and gorgeous men!

GAME FEATURES

  • At least 20 hours of play

  • 50 CGs (not counting variations)

  • Full English voice over

  • 3 love interests (including a polyamorous route)

  • Original soundtracks

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains implied sexual relations between men and tentacle creatures and may include Nudity or Sexual Content.

detailed_description:
Rhodias is a low-rank criminal. One day, an inexplicable urge prompts him to leave his gang behind and take to the distant mountains.

While wandering the alien hinterlands, he comes across a handsome traveler who invites him to the Temple of Renewal, where he claims Rhodias is bound to obtain many answers to his questions.

Being in the sacred Temple reveals unexpected things about him, including a primal hunger he didn’t know he had. Even stranger… he now has a new desire, he’s not so comfortable admitting: a desire for a close connection with the men he meets.

Dive into this new mature story filled with mystery, tentacles and gorgeous men!

GAME FEATURES

  • At least 20 hours of play

  • 50 CGs (not counting variations)

  • Full English voice over

  • 3 love interests (including a polyamorous route)

  • Original soundtracks

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo, AMD Phenom II or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: The Symbiant II

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo, AMD Phenom II or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 8MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 08/10/11
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 16MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Symbiant II is a BL / Yaoi / Gay visual novel about a man who goes through change he didn't ask for. It's also a tale of ancient secrets, intimate exploration and unlikely romance.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
